welcome_description.work: Publish your works of all types (book, magazine & newspaper or geographical map) to make them accessible to the public, and interact with subscribers to your works.
welcome_description.establishment: Register your institution (establishment, academic or other), interact with teachers or students, and share your programs and events.
welcome_description.government: Register your government institution (ministry, public company, or other) to be able to share your events and interact with the public.

terms_accept1: By creating your account, you accept our

circle.description: Chat circles allow you to talk with multiple members at the same time.

error_message.login_before_operation: You must first identify yourself to carry out this operation.
error_message.pending_after_payment: When you make your payment, your subscription will be validated within minutes.
error_message.no_server_response: No response received from the server.
error_message.cannot_switch_like: Unable to update your like. Try again.

empty_list.title: The list is empty
empty_list.description_cart: You haven’t added anything to your cart yet.
empty_list.description_comments_event: Here will be displayed all comments about the event.
empty_list.description_unpaid_consultation: Here will be displayed the works for which you have not yet paid to view.
empty_list.description_subscribers: Here you will see people who have paid to view your works.
empty_list.description_subscriptions: Here you will see the works you have paid for and the subscriptions you have ordered.
empty_list.description_chat_user: Here you will see the members you can communicate with.
empty_list.description_chat_circle: Here will be displayed your chat circles with other members.
empty_list.description_chat_organization: Your exchanges in establishments and/or institutions will be displayed here.
empty_list.description_chat_event: Here will be displayed your exchanges in the events to which you are invited.
empty_list.description_subscription: Here you will see the subscriptions you can add to your cart.
empty_list.description_news: Here, news about the organizations (establishment or government) on the platform will be displayed.
empty_list.description_popular: Here, the works most consulted by members will be displayed.
empty_list.description_books: Here, the books will be displayed which can be consulted by members.
empty_list.description_mags: Here, the journals, newspapers or magazines which can be consulted by members will be displayed.
empty_list.description_medias: Here, the medias will be displayed which can be consulted by members.
empty_list.description_favoris: Your favorite media will be displayed here for you to read whenever you want.
empty_list.description_maps: Here, geographic maps will be displayed which can be consulted by members.
empty_list.description_user_works: This member has not yet published any work.
empty_list.description_user_circles: This member is not part of any discussion circle.
empty_list.description_user_consultations: This member has not yet paid to view a work.
empty_list.description_establishments: Here will be displayed the establishments to which the members belong.
empty_list.description_establishment_programs: This establishment has not yet published a program.
empty_list.description_establishment_events: This establishment has not yet published any events.
empty_list.description_establishment_books: This establishment has not yet published any work.
empty_list.description_establishment_teach: There are no online courses for this establishment yet.
empty_list.description_governments: Here will be displayed the institutions to which the members belong.
empty_list.description_government_events: This institution has not yet published any events.

work.title: Details about the work
work.publishing_info: Your work will be reviewed before becoming visible on the platform.
work.author: Author

is_public.title: Paid consultation
is_public.description: For medias, viewing cost $2; and for other types of works, it’s $1. Boongo is entitled to 20% of each viewing payment.

work.max_files: Limit of {{ count }} files reached. Some files were skipped.

event.participate_before_comment: Please participate in the event before commenting.

search_filter_description: With the green button you can filter your results.

data.title: Add a class or promotion for this course year ({{ course_year }})

activation.title: Activate the subscription with a code
activation.description: One of our partners may have given you a unique code to activate the subscription

subscription.title: Add subscriptions to your cart
subscription.info: You do not have a subscription. Please subscribe to view.

consultation.info: Consulting this work is not free, as you may have noticed.

mobile_money.label: Mobile money
mobile_money.title: Payment by mobile money
mobile_money.descrciption: Choose your operator and enter the associated phone number.
mobile_money.submitted: Please confirm your transaction and click the button below

establishment.title: Establishment
establishment.publishing_info: Your establishment will only be visible to everyone after approval by the platform administrator.

data.name: Establishment name
data.legal_status: Legal status (e.g.: LLC, NPO, PLC, etc.)

government.title: Institutions
government.publishing_info: Your institution will only be visible to everyone after approval by the platform administrator.

data.name: Institution name
data.legal_status: Legal status (e.g.: LLC, NPO, PLC, etc.)

update_account.title: Update account
update_account.description: Information about your account. You can download an archive of your personal data.

privacy_and_safety.title: Privacy and safety
privacy_and_safety.description: Manage your access and your visibility (of your information) with other members.

blocked_accounts.title: Blocked accounts
blocked_accounts.description: View all members you have blocked.

close_account.title: Account closure
close_account.description: Your account will be recoverable for 30 days. Be sure to save your personal information before closing your account.

password.label: Password
password.reset_message: You can send your phone number so that we can change your password which we will send to you by SMS and/or WhatsApp.

disabled.title: Account disabled
disabled.description: You have deactivated your account. Please reactivate it to perform specific operations.

blocked.title: Account blocked
blocked.description: Your account is currently blocked because you do not comply with our terms of use. Please contact us by clicking the button below.

otp_code.title: Checking your {{ reference }}
otp_code.message_email: Please enter the code you received in your registered email.
otp_code.message_phone: Please enter the code you received by SMS on the phone number you registered.
otp_code.warning: The code will become invalid after 15 minutes

my_works.description: Become one of our partners to be able to publish your works which will be visible to all. And this will give you the advantage of acquiring money according to public consultations.
my_works.terms_link: Please click below to see our terms.

message.to_organization: {{ username }} sent a message to the organization {{ organisation_name }}.
message.to_event: {{ username }} sent a message to the event "{{ event_title }}".

user.new: Welcome to Boongo! Please read our terms of use to better navigate the platform.
user.back: Welcome back to Boongo! Please review our privacy policy, as we may have updated it.

partnership.partner: {{ username }} wants to become a partner.
partnership.sponsor: {{ username }} wants to sponsor the platform.

event.title_changed: {{ organisation_name }} changed the event title from "{{ former_event_title }}" to "{{ event_title }}".
event.request_for_membership: {{ username }} wants to join your event "{{ event_title }}".
event.expulsion: You have been removed from the event "{{ event_title }}".
event.separation: {{ username }} has left your event "{{ event_title }}".

invitation.speaker: {{ organisation_name }} has invited you as a speaker to the event "{{ event_title }}".
invitation.member: {{ organisation_name }} has invited you to the event "{{ event_title }}".

circle.request_for_membership: {{ username }} wants to join your discussion circle "{{ circle_name }}".
circle.expulsion: You have been removed from the discussion circle "{{ circle_name }}".
circle.separation: {{ username }} has left your discussion circle "{{ circle_name }}".

invitation.admin: {{ username }} has invited you as an administrator to the discussion circle "{{ circle_name }}".
invitation.member: {{ username }} has invited you to the discussion circle "{{ circle_name }}".

subscription.one: {{ username }} subscribed to view your work.
subscription.two: {{ username }} and one other member subscribed to view your work.
subscription.many: {{ count }} members subscribed to view your work.

consultation.two: {{ username }} and one other member viewed your work.

like.two: {{ username }} and one other member liked your work.

publishing.two: {{ username }} and one other member published works.
